Jesus, have any of you even seen {{champion:76}} skins?

Janna has how much clothing?
The difference between Janna and others like MF or Ahri is that Janna is not _nearly_ as sexualized.  She's showing skin, yes, but not for the express purpose of exciting 13-year-olds.
I only see two changes. Am I missing something?
yeah i'm seeing two splash updates here

If you read the patch notes,
> Fiora’s Nightraven and Royal Guard skins are getting a splash update this patch!
only two were changed.... so no.
Wow, u change fiora but not {{champion:6}} how dare u, this champ is the sexiest champ in tho whole game xD. jk
Why would you change him if he's already the sexiest {{champion:6}}
You know who doesn't need a splash update?  {{champion:9}} That's because he needs a new model {{item:3070}}
The models for non-Spirit Guard {{champion:77}} tho... so much squareness...
I want to buy this bundle but I already owned the project fiora skin. If I buy this bundle will it get cheaper since I already owned a skin included in this bundle?
Yes, Any skin/champion you own in a bundle reduces its price i believe.

So, this is a skin or a new splash art for the actual character. you know, to make up for this 17yo emo girl that hates her mom because she won't let her go out with Skyler and takes it out on fencing lessons{{champion:114}}
A: Fioras like 35+ B:She had to kill her dad to stop her family from being exiled because she wouldnt marry someone and C:Define emo, fiora is not that defintion.
K she's not 35. Her age is more around 25. I did all the maths figuring it out.
fiora is not fukn 35+ lmao. shes early to mid 20s
{{champion:103}}
She's fine, she's fine. Meanwhile, Galactic Nasus **still** looks pre-rework.

What part of Ahri's splash is fine?  I'm assuming we're talking about her base splash, which needs a completely new splash and not just another "improvement" that made it even worse than the first update.
Hey look! Rumble still looks like a rat in a mech. Lulu still has "Pre-rework Poppy" cheeks on her model. Priorities, some champs come ahead of Ahri in that category.

I'm not saying one deserves a priority over another, I'm stating the update Ahri got was awful and should be replaced eventually rather than be forgotten about because the "fix" it received was deemed good enough by Riot and pushed through the PBE despite complaints.
I don't see the problem with Ahri.

For the sake of not sounding like a broken record almost two years later, it's ugly and doesn't even come close to doing the champion justice, especially since the new skins for her have splashes with faces which actually resemble what she looks like.  I'm biased from Ahri being my favorite champion since 2012, but the new base looks like a completely different champion, and it tilted the fuck out of me to see the modified Dynasty and Midnight splashes with a random face change to make them look like the new base.

The skin update looks nice and I would maybe buy it. If I didn't ABSOLUTELY HATE Fiora since the rework. Please Riot let me return her. I want nothing to do with her. I can argue that I didn't even buy the current Fiora. The Fiora I bought was completely different. I also think her pool party skin is cool and would buy instantly if it was the old Fiora but there's no way I will now. The only time I even think about playing Fiora now is when she pops up in ARAM but I usually just rr cause I CANT STAND her. Ok,im done complaining. (Riot I'm serious about the return though. Please, can I?)

I made a comment about Fiora but it's not showing up.  As someone who only plays against her, the big problem I see is her ult.  The healing circle makes no sense.  I'd like to see her ult's Cookstown be reset either if she kills the opponent (kind of like Darius) or maybe even just if she gets all four hits.  That way she could contribute in a team fight while still being a duelist.

Well, the splash on those two skins do look a lot better, so that's good, thank you.  But sadly, the skins in the game still don't match up to what they used to be.

The old Royal Guard had a beautiful triple partition flowing from her shoulder, as well as the Night Raven one.  The new Royal Guard has a flag that dangles floppily.  And the Night Raven one is like a weird spiky, tumor growing out of her shoulder.  And the way she "walks" god!  It's like Pippy Longstocking or something.

I guess I'll try to endure her and maybe play her again, but haven't touched her since the changes.  Could you please restore her look to the way it was or something? 

Thank you. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Maybe if League didn't reset its system volume to max every time it updates i might actually listen to your splash music.

Maybe turn down the volume..?
P.S Just a suggestion.
So when is Rito updating {{champion:55}} 's splash arts? In her rework? ;^;
